text: wamin hula' almunafiqin man yastamie 'iilayk -'ayaha alnabi- bighayr fahma; thawnana minhum wastkhfafana, hataa 'iidha ansarafuu min mujlisik qaluu liman hadaruu mujlisak min 'ahl aleilm bikitab allah ealaa sabil alastihza'a: madha qal muhamad alana? 'uwlayik aldhyn khatam allah ealaa qulubihim, fala tafiqih alhaqu wala tahtadi 'iilayha, watabaeuu 'ahwa'ahum fi alkufr waldalala
